articles.title: MN: Power, pace and predictability – several critical flaws in Milan recently exposed

articles.title: Milan annoyed by refereeing errors, but around Milanello they opt for silence
articles.summary: Milan-Parma was only the latest in a dossier of matches which saw the Rossoneri team being damaged in some way by rather dubious refereeing decisions.

articles.title: Galli has no doubts: "Maignan suffered a block on Sunday. It's a foul, end of discussions"

articles.summary: AC Milan have fallen 10 points behind Inter after taking one point from their last two games, and the Scudetto dream is now over. articles.summary: Milan-Parma brought with it controversy over yet another refereeing errors. Today's edition of Corriere dello Sport headlines: "Bad mood at Milanello, but silence is chosen".

articles.title: Pulisic, where have you gone? Few minutes and zero goals in 2026, the American no longer has an impact
articles.summary: Milan is not experiencing a happy moment. First the draw against Como, then the defeat against Parma and the consequent -10 from Inter, peppered with several refereeing episodes which only increased the nervousness.

articles.summary: AC Milan find themselves 10 points off top spot and with their unbeaten run over, but Massimiliano Allegri must rally the troops. articles.title: La Gazzetta: "Gabbia relief, no injury to the right flexor"
articles.summary: Sigh of relief for Milan and Matteo Gabbia. The Rossoneri player had withdrawn before the start of the match against Parma and it was thought that he had a significant muscle injury, but fortunately this is not the case.

articles.title: Serious mistakes, but the club's silence is also not good. Lock down the Champions League then targeted purchases. Watch out for the backlash
articles.summary: It would be wrong to reduce everything to refereeing episodes, and equally wrong not to consider VAR errors just for the sake of going against Max Allegri. When analyzing Milan's current moment, both factors must be taken into account.

articles.title: CorSport on Milan: "Tris for the Champions League spot"
articles.summary: After the defeat against Parma, Milan must look forward. The Devil's objective must be what Max Allegri has always declared, qualification for the next Champions League.

articles.summary: Milan has not yet digested the home defeat against Parma. And not for the defeat itself, but for how it happened and for the obvious refereeing errors that affected the match.

articles.title: Cheerful, it's your turn: Max the commander to reach the final goal
